channel.title: 508 client help
channel.description: i have yourname 508 client but it doesnt have dclaws, deathcape, dplate....does any one know how to put them in there or....have a 508 client with it already in it?? please need help very very bad!! thxxx

item.title: 508 client help
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s called adding custom items, and there are many tutorials on how to do it in the Private Server Client Hacking section.

Read full topic
